title: More stuff to complain about because why not
body:
Played against a zed that got super fed, the rest of their team weren’t doing the best. 
we lost
the game feels too much like a 1v5 game rather than a team game 
i probably just made this because i lost

replies.body: well zed is just busted to start off with. there is just too much damage and tank stats in the game.

In that situation, we call it:

1v9

I've had plenty of games where it feels like one player is dominating us all compared to the rest of their team, but i think it comes down to how your teammates deal with this player. I know some champs can get super strong when they are fed and are able to fight your team almost single handed. In my experience Fiora, Darius, Maokai are a few examples of champs that feel really powerful when they get ahead. 

I'm no pro at this game so i don't really know how to play against a powerful fed opponent such as this but i think it would come down to building correctly and evening out the playing field, to my understanding the kills give your opponent a nice gold advantage so trying to even out that gold advantage would make it easier to fight them. That said I know some champions are designed to counteract a certain way of playing (which is probably why they are divided into classes or roles) so it could be harder to deal with this champion.
